title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1734/93 of 30 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 and (EEC) No 1148/93 laying down detailed rules for implementing the specific measures for supplying the French overseas departments with live bovine animals and breeding horses
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1734/93 of 30 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 and (EEC) No 1148/93 laying down detailed rules for implementing the specific measures for supplying the French overseas departments with live bovine  animals and breeding horses
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 (3) is hereby replaced by Annex I to this Regulation.
Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 2312/92 is hereby replaced by Annex II to this Regulation.
The Annex to Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1148/93 (4) is hereby replaced by Annex III to this Regulation.
The aid shall be determined in such a way that the proportion of products supplied from the Community is preserved, taking account of traditional trade flows.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1993.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 356, 24. 12. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 378, 23. 12. 1992, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 222, 7. 8. 1992, p. 32.
(4) OJ No L 116, 12. 5. 1993, p. 15.
ANNEX I
'ANNEX I
PART 1
Supply balance for Réunion for male bovine animals for fattening for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
Supply balance for Guyana for male bovine animals for fattening for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
ANNEX II
'ANNEX III
PART 1
Supply to Réunion of pure-bred breeding bovines originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
Supply to Guyana of pure-bred breeding bovines originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
Supply to Martinique of pure-bred breeding bovines originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
Supply to Guadeloupe of pure-bred breeding bovines originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
(1) Entry under this subheading is subject to the conditions laid down in the relevant Community provisions.'
ANNEX III
'ANNEX
PART 1
Supply to French Guiana of pure-bred breeding horses originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
/* Tables: see OJ */
Supply to Martinique of pure-bred breeding horses originating in the Community for the period 1 July 1993 to 30 June 1994
/* Tables: see OJ */
(1) Inclusion in this subheading is subject to the conditions provided for by Council Directive 90/427/EEC of 26 June 1990 on the zootechnical and genealogical conditions governing intra-Community trade in equidae (OJ No L 224, 20. 8. 1990, p.  55).'
